response:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for contacting Hermes and for your interest in the LTH0976 Leather Bifold Wallets. We're delighted to hear you're considering them for your new boutique and appreciate you thinking of Hermes for your inventory.

Regarding your request to order all available LTH0976 Leather Bifold Wallets, we've encountered an unforeseen technical issue with this specific product in our system. This is temporarily preventing us from confirming its current stock and processing your order as requested.

We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience. Please be assured that our team is working diligently to resolve this matter with utmost priority.

We will get back to you as soon as possible with an update on the LTH0976 wallets and how we can proceed with your order.

In the meantime, if you have any questions or if there's anything else we can assist you with for your boutique, please do not hesitate to ask.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Best regards,
Hermes - Delivering divine fashion
